body:
Hi Guedi,

You should check out Christoph Reinhart's presentation "Development
and validation of a Radiance model for a translucent panel " from
last year's Radiance workshop:

http://irc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/ie/light/RadianceWorkshop2005/

He has written a paper on the topic with Marilyne Anderson of MIT
(formerly EPFL), but I'm not sure it's out yet.

-Greg
